info.author: Bruce Frederiksen
info.description:
This program allows you to create a virtual ornamental lathe on your
computer.  The program then simulates the operation of this lathe and
generates G-Code to reproduce the same work on a modern CNC machine.

The emphasis right now is on generating G-code to cut wood, rather than on
pretty graphics.

For documentation, check with the `google code site`__.

.. __: http://code.google.com/p/ornamental-lathe-simulator/
info.name: ot_simulator
